title: When You Impress Someone So Much In Game

replies.body:
Once, on my birthday, I had a really terrible game. Three of my teammates just spent the entire match flaming each other and me, taking every opportunity to shout at me. After the match was over the fourth teammate said that he thought I did well, and I told him that it was my birthday. He mystery gifted me a skin.

Infernal Nasus

To this day, that memory never fails to bring a smile to my face.

When ye stare into The Abyss, The Abyss stares back.

I be rather enjoyed ye found a Light in that blackened Lake of Fire that be yer game that day when starin' into that Abyss, though. Glad to see ye be standin' after walkin' past that Darkness.

Not everyday ye get to see a joyous gift upon 'ese broken shores... So good luck an' fair tidings to ye an' th' little Light ye held in yer memory from 'ese strings of time forward.
Guess I need to try harder then...

I once went Kalista with a Thresh bot. Before the match started he asked if I had Blood Moon so we could be a BM bot lane, but I didn't so I said I didn't but I'm planning on buying it.
We rekt, Thresh was super good and fun and we had a great time and after the game he gifted me Blood Moon Kalista, and I was just internally screaming(with joy ofc).

That feeling when Woad Darius and Pentakill Olaf were both gifts from people getting down on their knees and thanking baby Jesus and BARD for getting them through their promos. 

{{champion:432}}

When I get a job with a nice steady income, that's when I'll be the gift giver to repay my debt of gratitude to all the people who've gifted me skins.
Such a great system for kindness.

Every time I play {{champion:68}}  bby 

I mean, they don't, but they feel like they should... probably... I don't know. I guess they are
I was hoping that I would carry a team hard enough with {{champion:202}} that they would gift me high noon welp there's gotta be one person with money somewhere in my next 100 games
I remember going mid Fiddlesticks 2 seasons ago and beating a Galio main so bad he mystery gifted me a skin afterwards
